events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it does not fit well, I would like to request a refund for this order as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund based on the customer's request for money back due to fit issues.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order placed by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support about your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or is in original condition?
The order number is 987654321 and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, never worn.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your jacket. You will receive confirmation once the refund is completed.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the easy refund process you’ve started.
The refund has been processed successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund for your jacket order and if everything is satisfactory.
I have received the refund in my bank account today. Thank you for the excellent customer service.
We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need any further assistance.
